Name: Hangover
About the game: You wake up after a party in a mess and realizing that you need to get to work in an hour. You are also supposed to bring something with you, but you forgot what it was. What will you do before going to the office? That's just up to you. Are you a good person or are you hiding villain deep inside? Do you prefer the easy or the harder way? Will you risk getting fired so you save your friends? You are the player. You choose. List of features Unique graphics Simple controls Multiple endings Loads of easter eggs Funny achievements Interesting story Hangover is a point and click adventure with elements of telltale games with unique cartoony graphics. There are various items and you can combine a lot of them with other items or with the environment. There are lots of hidden easter eggs which unlock you new achievements as well.
